comment: An alternate definition of "true" (see comment of ~ df-tru ). The associated justification theorem is ~ monothetic . (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Oct-2010.) (Revised by BJ, 12-Jul-2019.) Use ~ tru instead. (New usage is discouraged.)
